EmailTemplate.name: 11-17-22 BNK Connect Webinar Invite.BNK Connect Webinar Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Do your ATMs have the right logical protection?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Filled with cash, ATMs remain a target for thieves and jackpotting, as a result logical attacks continue to rise at ATMs across the globe. Are you confident you have the best logical protection in place to protect your financial institutions from significant cash loss and reputation damage? Join us on Tuesday, November 29th, 2022 - 10 a.m. EST to hear more about: - Recent trends in logical ATM attacks - How these logical attacks are being carried out - How to reduce your risk of successful attacks <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> Â© 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
